Description.English: shared_AttackerEverything: Changes the BasicAttackType -Seamine- to be able to attack everything else. Seamines itself still work fine and you can use the BasicAttackType for your objects that should be able to attack everything, also island buildings.

KnownIssues.English: Anno devs hardcoded some limitations: Assets with BasicAttackType=HunterAirship only auto-shoots at objects with the Bombarder property. While Seamine (and maybe also others) won't auto shoot at objects with the Bombarder property, even if you added Airship into the CanAttackTable.
KnownIssues.German: Leider haben die Anno Devs eine Limitierung hardcoded: Assets mit BasicAttackType=HunterAirship schießen nur automatisch auf Ziele die das Bombarder property haben. Während Seamine (und evlt andere) nicht automatisch auf Objekte mit Bombarder property schießen, also zb. Airships, auch wenn Airship zu der CanAttackTable zugefügt wurde.
